name: Big Hunter Bow Expert
description:
Big Hunter Bow Expert is wild animal hunting simulation game that gives you the real time experience of hunting in the stone age. In the past archeries was most important weapon which was used for hunting and war. In the modern days we offer you an old concept of bow animal hunting FSPS simulation for you.
Features

- Real 3D graphics.
- Different levels.
- Real time hunting scenes.
- Easy and smooth controls.
- Real hunting sound effects.
